tool_description: Help you generate fake data in a fast and easy way.  Addresses- Books- Companies- Credit Cards- Images- Persons- Places- Products- Texts- Users
name: Fake Data
title: Fake Data

api_list.name: Users
api_list.description:
Get 10 fake Users information .
Gender optional.

api_list.name: Texts
Products
Places
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fake-data3.p.rapidapi.com/fk/places"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fake-data3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Images

optional_parameters.name: _type
